reuters.title: <SULLIVAN MINES INC> YEAR LOSS
reuters.body: Oper shr loss 12 cts vs profit four cts Oper loss 1,069,000 vs profit 339,000 Revs 12.8 mln vs 10.9 mln Note: 1986 shr and net exclude extraordinary gain of 382,000 dlrs or four cts share. 1985 shr and net exclude extraordinary gain of 183,000 dlrs or two cts share Reuter 
